name: GetAllMileageEntryPrices
description: Use this endpoint to retrieve all Mileage entry prices in bulk.  Max number of items returned in a single call is 1000. Use the continuation cursor parameter to set the continuation cursor for retrieval of next set of data. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

Cursor.description: Use this parameter to set the continuation cursor for paging. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

Filter.description: Use this parameter to set the filtering for fields. [filtering instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Filtering)

$block: Array of objects along with a cursor. Max number in the array returned is 1000

$ul:
**cursor**: Use this continuation cursor in a request back to continue the list. In case there are no more items to retrieve, the cursor is not returned at all.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**items**: Max number of items returned is 1000.

Filterable: not filterable
